name: Tour De Yorksheep
description:
Created by The Kodebolds for the Yorkshire Game Jam. An endless runner game based on the Tour de Yorkshire. Ride your bike along the Yorkshire Dales whilst dodging loose sheep. See how far you can get!

Team members:

  • Anthony Beacock
  • Jakob Scrivener
  • Dean Barnard
  • Axel Davenport
